description: [TRITON](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0609) was run as trilog.exe, a Py2EXE compiled python script that accepts a single IP address as a flag.(Citation: FireEye TRITON 2017)

external_references.description: Johnson, B, et. al. (2017, December 14). Attackers Deploy New ICS Attack Framework "TRITON" and Cause Operational Disruption to Critical Infrastructure. Retrieved January 6, 2021.
